question: What is the name of the Lokpal member and former Chief Justice of Chhattisgarh High Court, who recently passed away?
explanation:
One of the four Judicial Members of the Lokpal and former Chief justice of the Chhattisgarh High Court, Justice Ajay Kumar Tripathi passed away recently after suffering a cardiac arrest at the age of 62. He had contracted coronavirus last month.
He was appointed as the member of the anti-corruption ombudsman Lokpal last year. He has served as the Additional Advocate General for the state of Bihar and Additional Judge of the Patna High Court and later its Chief Justice.
